effect.name: Nearest neighbor
effect.description:
Upscale the screen to a higher resolution using nearest neighbor.
Special thanks to Salamanderpants for making this extension possible.
Last Updated: 2026-01-10 03:34
effect.author: Sebastian Janisz

parameter.name: Source width
parameter.description: Width in pixels of the size of the area to enlarge.

parameter.name: Source height
parameter.description: Height in pixels of the size of the area to enlarge.

parameter.name: Viewport width
parameter.description: Width in pixels of the viewport we are stretching to.

parameter.name: Viewport height
parameter.description: Height in pixels of the viewport we are stretching to.
